content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Factory at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position: (60.0, -60.0)) with iron-ore as input and iron-plate as output
- Burner Inserter (position: (60.5, -61.5)) connected to the furnace
- Burner Inserter (position: (61.5, -61.5)) connected to the previous inserter and a wooden chest
- Wooden Chest (position: (62.5, -61.5)) for storing output

### Water Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump (position: (107.5, -33.5)) pumping water
- Pipe Group (fluid system: 141455) connecting the pump to other entities

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position: (111.5, -32.0)) with no fuel
- Pipe Group (fluid system: 141457) connecting the boiler to other entities

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (position: (117.5, -30.5)) with no input liquid
- Small Electric Pole (position: (119.5, -30.5)) connected to the engine
- Pipe Group (fluid system: 141457) connecting the engine to other entities

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that the entity can accept the item being inserted
- Check if the entity has enough space to accept the item
- Make sure the agent has the item in its inventory before attempting to insert it

### Errors when using burners
- Ensure that the burner has fuel before attempting to use it
- Check if the burner is connected to the correct entities

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity

### NAMESPACE
- Utility functions:
  - `insert_item`: inserts an item into an entity
  - `place_entity`: places an entity on the map
- Important variables:
  - `inventory`: the agent's current inventory
  - `entities`: the list of entities on the map
  - `position`: the current position of the agent
  - `Prototype`: a dictionary of item prototypes
  - `Direction`: a dictionary of directions (e.g. UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT)
